import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import img1 from '../../../assets/img/room-suite/homestead-apt-1.jpg'; const apartmentspost = [ { img: img1, title: 'Livewell Suite', text: '1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, Queen Bed, Fully Furnished', utilities: 'Utilities Included: Water', price: '3300', period: 'Month' }, ]; class Facilities extends Component { render() { return (
Now Leasing

Current Offering

{apartmentspost.length === 1 ? (

{apartmentspost[0].title}

{apartmentspost[0].text}

{apartmentspost[0].utilities}

${apartmentspost[0].price}/{apartmentspost[0].period}
) : ( apartmentspost.map((item, i) => (
{i === 0 ? ( ) : ( )}

{item.title}

{item.text}

{item.utilities}

${item.price}/{item.period}
)) )}
); } } export default Facilities;
